Package View_Interfaces

//TODO: Further comments - Separation of View and MenuBar for controller.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IActualStateEditView
    In this view the user can change the actual state of the cost estimation.
    IAdditionTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit, create and delete additions of a requirement analysis.
    ICostEstimationEditView
    This interface defines the basic functionality for editing a cost estimation in a view.
    ICostEstimationShowView
    Views implementing this interface presents data of the current cost estimation to the user.
    ICostEstimationTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit the current cost estimation.
    ICustomerTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit the saved information about the customer.
    IDialog
    This interface is used for dialogs to interact with the user by blocking all other views.
    IErrorDialog
    This interface is used for dialogs to inform the user about a error occurred in execution the program.
    IFileChooser
    Classes implementing this interface provide a simple mechanism to let the user choose a file.
    IFRequirementEditView
    This interface extends IRequirementFormView by adding text fields for specific parameter of functional requirements.
    IFRequirementShowView
    This interface extends IRequirementShowView by adding fields for specific parameter of functional requirements.
    IFRequirementTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit, create and delete functional requirements of a requirement analysis.
    IGlossaryTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit, create and delete glossary entries of a requirement analysis.
    IInfoDialog
    This interface is used for dialogs to inform the user about the state of the system.
    ILoadingDialog
    Views implementing this interface provide a simple mechanism to show loading dialogs.
    IMenuBar
    This interface sets up a standard for menu bars of IView.
    INFRequirementEditView
    This interface extends IRequirementFormView by adding text fields for specific parameter of nonfunctional requirements.
    INFRequirementShowView
    This interface extends IRequirementShowView by adding fields for specific parameter of nonfunctional requirements.
    INFRequirementTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit, create and delete nonfunctional requirements of a requirement analysis.
    IOptimizedWeightFactorsView
    Views implementing this interface show the user the new calculated weight factors and give him the opportunity to cancel the optimization.
    IProcessClassificationView
    In this view the user can set the class and edit the data and/or transaction function point parameters of a elementary process for the cost estimation.
    IProductApplicationTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit the product application of a requirement analysis.
    IProductDataEditView
    This interface extends IRequirementFormView by adding text fields for specific parameter of product data.
    IProductDataShowView
    This interface extends IRequirementShowView by adding fields for specific parameter of product data.
    IProductDataTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit, create and delete product data of a requirement analysis.
    IProductEnvironmentTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit the product environment of a requirement analysis.
    IProjectCreateView
    This view contains text fields for the project title, supplier/project manager data, customer and company data.
    IProjectTab
    This tab interface provides basic functionality for managing the opened requirement analysis.
    IProjectView
    This interface defines the basic view structure for editing a requirement analysis.
    IQualityRequirementTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit, create and delete quality requirements of a requirement analysis.
    IRequirementFormView
    This interface builds up a standard structure for view for adding and editing a requirement.
    IRequirementShowView<RequirementType extends IRequirement>
    Views of this interface show the user detailed information about a requirement.
    IStartView
    This view is shown by starting the application.
    ITab
    This interface defines a basic structure of tabs used for IProjectView.
    ITableTab
    This interface is a specialisation of ITab defining a standard structure of editing, creating, showing and deleting multiple entries displayed in a table.
    ITargetDefinitionTab
    This tab interface provides functionality to edit the target definition of a requirement analysis.
    ITextTab
    This interface is a specialisation of ITab defining a standard structure of editing a big texts.
    IView
    Basic interface which provides a standard structure for views.
    IViewFacadeFactory
    This factory provides a simple interface for creating views while representing a facade for the view component.
    IWarningDialog
    This interface is used for dialogs to warn the user about a consequence of the action he want to take.
    IWeightFactorEditView  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileAccessType
    Created by phlippe on 01.05.17.
